chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
R: BSRS
ff: falsity_flag
rho: env (option (string bool))
t: term
u: string bool

Goal:
eval rho t = None -> eval rho (prep u t) = None

Premises:
env = fun domain : Type => nat -> domain : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
eval : forall domain : Type, interp domain -> env domain -> term -> domain
string = fun X : Type => list X : Type -> Type Arguments string _%type_scope
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
prep = fix prep (x : string bool) (t : term) {struct x} : term := match x with | [] => t | b :: x0 => t_f b (prep x0 t) end : string bool -> term -> term
IB_eval_Some : forall (rho : env (option (list bool))) (t : term) (u : string bool) (v : list bool), eval rho t = Some v -> eval rho (prep u t) = Some (u ++ v)
IB_prep : forall (R : BSRS) (rho : env (list bool)) (s : string bool) (t : term), eval rho (prep s t) = s ++ eval rho t
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n where ?A : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag rho : env (option (string bool)) t : term u : string bool |- Type] ?B : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag rho : env (option (string bool)) t : term u : string bool |- Type]
IB_enc : forall (R : BSRS) (rho : env (string bool)) (s : string bool), eval rho (enc s) = s
iprep_eval : forall (domain : Type) (I : interp domain) (rho : env domain) (x : string bool) (s : term), eval rho (prep x s) = iprep x (eval rho s)
eval_comp : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (rho : env D) (xi : nat -> term) (t : term), eval rho t`[xi] = eval (xi >> eval rho) t
eval_ext : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (rho xi : nat -> D) (t : term), (forall x : nat, rho x = xi x) -> eval rho t = eval xi t
Ctx : forall (A : list form) (phi : form), In phi A -> A ⊢ phi where ?p : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag rho : env (option (string bool)) t : term u : string bool |- peirce]
AllE : forall (A : list form) (t0 : term) (phi : form), A ⊢ (∀ phi) -> A ⊢ phi[t0..] where ?p : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag rho : env (option (string bool)) t : term u : string bool |- peirce]
IE : forall (A : list form) (phi psi : form), A ⊢ (phi --> psi) -> A ⊢ phi -> A ⊢ psi where ?p : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag rho : env (option (string bool)) t : term u : string bool |- peirce]
der_sing : forall (P : stack ?X) (x y : list ?X), In (x / y) P -> derivable P x y where ?X : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag rho : env (option (string bool)) t : term u : string bool |- Type]
IB = B_I (fun f : sig_func => match f as s return (Vector.t (option (string bool)) (ar_syms s) -> option (string bool)) with | s_f b => fun v : Vector.t (option (string bool)) (ar_syms (s_f b)) => match Vector.hd v with | Some u => Some (b :: u) | None => None end | s_e => fun _ : Vector.t (option (string bool)) (ar_syms s_e) => Some [] end) (fun P : sig_pred => match P as s return (Vector.t (option (string bool)) (ar_preds s) -> Prop) with | sPr => fun v : Vector.t (option (string bool)) (ar_preds sPr) => match Vector.hd v with | Some u => match Vector.hd (Vector.tl v) with | Some v0 => derivable R u v0 | None => True end | None => True end | sQ => fun _ : Vector.t (option (string bool)) (ar...
sat_subst : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (ff : falsity_flag) (rho : env D) (sigma : nat -> term) (phi : form), (forall x : nat, eval rho (sigma x) = rho x) -> rho ⊨ phi < -> rho ⊨ phi[sigma]
der_cons : forall (P : stack ?X) (x y : list ?X) (u0 v : string ?X), In (x / y) P -> derivable P u0 v -> derivable P (x ++ u0) (y ++ v) where ?X : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag rho : env (option (string bool)) t : term u : string bool |- Type]
prep_app : forall (x y : list bool) (t : term), prep (x ++ y) t = prep x (prep y t)
Kripke.ksat_comp : forall (D : Type) (M : Kripke.kmodel D) (ff : falsity_flag) (u : Kripke.nodes (domain:=D)) (rho : nat -> D) (xi : nat -> term) (phi : form), Kripke.ksat u rho phi[xi] < -> Kripke.ksat u (xi >> eval rho) phi
sat_comp : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (ff : falsity_flag) (rho : env D) (xi : nat -> term) (phi : form), rho ⊨ phi[xi] < -> (xi >> eval rho) ⊨ phi
Position.pos_None : forall (X : EqDec.eqType) (x : EqDec.eqType_X X) (l l' : list (EqDec.eqType_X X)), Position.pos x l = None -> Position.pos x l' = None -> Position.pos x (l ++ l') = None
ZMicromega.genCuttingPlaneNone : forall (env : RingMicromega.PolEnv BinNums.Z) (f : RingMicromega.NFormula BinNums.Z), ZMicromega.genCuttingPlane f = None -> ZMicromega.eval_nformula env f -> False
IB_F : forall (R : BSRS) (rho : env (string bool)), rho ⊨ F R -> dPCPb R
IB_drv : forall (R : BSRS) (rho : env (string bool)) (t1 t2 : term), rho ⊨ Pr t1 t2 < -> derivable R (eval rho t1) (eval rho t2)
Kripke.ksat_ext : forall (D : Type) (M : Kripke.kmodel D) (ff : falsity_flag) (u : Kripke.nodes (domain:=D)) (rho xi : nat -> D) (phi : form), (forall x : nat, rho x = xi x) -> Kripke.ksat u rho phi < -> Kripke.ksat u xi phi
IB_F3 : forall (R : BSRS) (rho : env (string bool)), rho ⊨ F3
drv_val : forall (R : BSRS) (domain : Type) (I : interp domain) (rho : env domain) (u v : string bool), derivable R u v -> rho ⊨ (F1 R ==> F2 R ==> Pr (enc u) (enc v))
IB_F2 : forall (R : BSRS) (rho : env (string bool)), rho ⊫ F2 R
IB_F1 : forall (R : BSRS) (rho : env (string bool)), rho ⊫ F1 R
prep_subst : forall (sigma : nat -> term) (t : term) (x : string bool), (prep x t)`[sigma] = prep x t`[sigma]
find_none : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), find f l = None -> forall x : A, In x l -> f x = false
String.index_correct4 : forall (n : nat) (s : String.string), String.index n String.EmptyString s = None -> String.length s < n
hd_error_nil : forall A : Type, hd_error [] = None

```coq
```coq
 intros H.
 unfold eval in H.
 apply H.
 Qed.
